hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty' | { read file_path; if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.rs$'; then cargo fmt -- "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; }
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty' | { read file_path; if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.toml$'; then taplo fmt "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; }

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty' | { read file_path; if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(yaml|yml)$'; then prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; }
